body: func Fragment(pos vec4, tex vec2, col vec4) vec4 {

vec3.description: Usage vec3(x, y, z) or vec3(x)

vec4.description: Usage vec4(x, y, z, w) or vec4(x)

mat2.description:
Usage mat2(
  a, b,
  c, d
)

mat3.description:
Usage mat3(
  a, b, c,
  d, e, f,
  g, h, i
)

mat4.description:
Usage mat4(
  a, b, c, d,
  e, f, g, h,
  i, j, k, l
)

sin.description:
Usage sin(x T)

T is float or vec

cos.description:
Usage cos(x T)

T is float or vec

tan.description:
Usage tan(x T)

T is float or vec

asin.description:
Usage asin(x T)

T is float or vec

acos.description:
Usage acos(x T)

T is float or vec

atan.description:
Usage atan(y_over_x T)

T is float or vec

atan2.description:
Usage atan2(x, y T)

T is float or vec

pow.description:
Usage pow(x, y T)

T is float or vec

exp.description:
Usage exp(x T)

T is float or vec

log.description:
Usage log(x T)

T is float or vec

exp2.description:
Usage exp2(x T)

T is float or vec

log2.description:
Usage log2(x T)

T is float or vec

sqrt.description:
Usage sqrt(x T)

T is float or vec

inversesqrt.description:
Usage inversesqrt(x T)

T is float or vec

abs.description:
Usage abs(x T)

T is float or vec

sign.description:
Usage sign(x T)

T is float or vec

floor.description:
Usage floor(x T)

T is float or vec

ceil.description:
Usage ceil(x T)

T is float or vec

fract.description:
Usage fract(x T)

T is float or vec

mod.description:
Usage mod(x, y T)

T is float or vec

min.description:
Usage min(x, y T)

T is float or vec

max.description:
Usage max(x, y T)

T is float or vec

clamp.description:
Usage clap(x, min, max T)

T is float or vec

mix.description:
Usage mix(x, y, a T)

T is float or vec

step.description:
Usage step(edge, x T)

T is float or vec

smoothstep.description:
Usage smoothstep(edge0, edge1, x T)

T is float or vec

length.description:
Usage length(x T)

T is float or vec

distance.description:
Usage distance(p0, p1 T)

T is float or vec

dot.description:
Usage dot(x, y T)

T is float or vec

normalize.description:
Usage normalize(x T)

T is float or vec

faceforward.description:
Usage faceforward(n, i, nref T)

T is float or vec

reflect.description:
Usage reflect(i, n T)

T is float or vec

refract.description:
Usage refract(i, n T, eta float)

T is float or vec

transpose.description:
Usage transpose(x T)

T is mat

dfdx.description:
Usage dfdx(x T)

T is float or vec

dfdy.description:
Usage dfdy(x T)

T is float or vec

fwidth.description:
Usage fwidth(x T)

T is float or vec
